TopicTitle: EVE city lights not looking right

Articles.Content:
Hello, 

I recently installed EVE, because, like everyone, I wanted my KSP to look realistic. However, the city lights look like absolute ..... Low res, and sometimes even cover the whole night side of Kerbin. I didn't download the low res version of the mod. 

Now, I know I can just delete the plugin and get rid of it, but I just want to know what might be causing this problem. 

Thanks ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

are highres citylights aviable? 

you can just delete the citylights from the plugin.... 

in MY opinion the whole city lights from eve are inconsistent because you have city lights in the night from cities which are non existent at daytime...
